user.title: Configure DRK Blutspende
user.description: Please provide the following information to set up the integration.

data_description.radius: The radius in which you want to search
data_description.countyid: The county in which you want to search
data_description.lookahead: How many days in the future you want to search
data_description.timeformat: The format in which the dates will be formated
data_description.zipfilter: Filter for zipcodes you want to include, comma seperated
